title: yOgiyaik-kaNDEn
sahitya:
yOgiyaik-kaNDEn paripUraNa


anupallavi

  dEhiyavan shddha yOgi avan shiva dAhiyavan tanadAgiya sutantra


caraNam    Ongiya vAnam pOl oLi maNi shuDaraippOl ODum aruvi pOl pADum kuzhalaip-pOl
tAngum malaiyaippOl tUngum sahaja niSTai nIngA shuDar enavE nilavum paripUraNa
